entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Fiend

entries.name: Size
entries: Small (about 2–3 feet tall).

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Ashen Legacy
entries: You know the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip.
Starting at 3rd level, you always have {@spell charm person} prepared; starting at 5th level, you always have {@spell invisibility} prepared.
You can cast each of these spells once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast them this way when you finish a long rest. You can also cast them using spell slots.

entries.name: Fiendish Fortune
entries: When a creature you can see within 30 feet of you makes an attack roll, you can use your reaction to magically twist fate, adding your proficiency bonus to the roll. If the target is an ally, add the bonus; if the target is an enemy, subtract it.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus (long rest).

entries.name: Scorpion Sting
entries: You can make unarmed strikes with your tail stinger (Strength or Dexterity). On a hit, the strike deals 1d4 piercing damage; you can also deal an extra 1d6 poison damage a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus (regain one on a short rest, all on a long rest). At 10th level the extra damage becomes 2d6.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Humanoid

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (about 5–6 feet tall).

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Azure Legacy
entries: You know the {@spell guidance} cantrip.
Starting at 3rd level, you always have {@spell bless} prepared; starting at 5th level, you always have {@spell aid} prepared.

You can cast each spell once without a spell slot and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. You can also cast them using spell slots. Your spellcasting ability is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (choose when you select this species).

entries.name: Glimpse Fate
entries: When you or a creature you can see within 30 feet makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can use your reaction to let the target roll a d4 and add it to the roll.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus (long rest).

entries.name: Winds of Magic
entries: You know the {@spell gust} cantrip.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Humanoid

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (about 5–7 feet tall).

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Bog Bulk
entries: You have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws to resist being pushed, pulled, or knocked prone.

entries.name: Guiding Bond
entries: As an action, choose a creature within 30 feet. Until the start of your next turn, when that creature makes an attack roll or ability check, it can roll a d4 and add the result.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus (long rest).

entries.name: Keen Senses
entries: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries: If you lose a limb, organ, or other body part, it regrows and becomes functional after 1d4 + 1 weeks.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Humanoid

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (about 5–7 feet tall).

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Cursed Claws
entries: Your claws are natural weapons you can use to make unarmed strikes which deal 1d6 slashing damage on a hit.

entries.name: Grey Balance
entries: When you miss with a melee weapon attack, you can immediately make one unarmed strike with your claws against the same target.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus (long rest).

entries.name: Lupine Senses
entries: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Aberration

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (about 5–7 feet tall).

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet, and you have a swim speed equal to your walking speed.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You have darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

entries.name: Eldritch Gibbering
entries: As an action, gibber in Deep Speech. Each creature of your choice in a 30-foot emanation must succeed on a Wisdom save (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier) or be frightened of you until the end of its next turn. A creature that succeeds is immune for 24 hours.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus (long rest).

entries.name: Endless Hunger
entries: At the end of your turn, if a creature within 5 feet is at 0 hit points, you can use your reaction to gain temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Plant

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (about 5–8 feet tall).

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Deep Roots
entries: You have advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws against being knocked prone or moved against your will. You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Elderwood Whispers
entries: When you finish a long rest, choose one skill, tool, or language. Until the end of your next long rest, you gain proficiency in the chosen option.

entries.name: Grasping Branches
entries: As a bonus action, choose a creature you can see within 10 feet. The target must succeed on a Strength save (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier) or be restrained by your branches until the end of your next turn.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus (long rest).

entries.name: Root Sense
entries: You have tremorsense with a range of 10 feet while in contact with the ground.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Undead

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (about 5–7 feet tall).

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Devour Corpse
entries: As an action, consume a portion of a corpse within 5 feet to regain hit points equal to your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier. You can’t use this trait on the same corpse again.

entries.name: Frozen Waste
entries: You have resistance to cold damage and are adapted to freezing climates.

entries.name: Infused Drakkonite
entries: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill. When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with a 10-foot emanation of cold: each creature must make a Constitution save (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier) or take cold damage equal to your proficiency bonus and have its speed reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus (long rest).

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Construct

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (about 5–7 feet tall).

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Culling
entries: As an action, choose one willing creature you can see within 5 feet who is touching the ground and can see you. The target regains hit points equal to a roll of one of its Hit Dice + your proficiency bonus and is cured of the poisoned condition.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus; regain one use on a short rest and all on a long rest.

entries.name: Jack-O-Lantern
entries: You know the {@spell dancing lights} cantrip. Your spellcasting ability is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (choose when you select this species).

entries.name: Scarecrow Nature
entries: You don’t require air, food, or drink.

entries.name: Watchful Rest
entries: When you take a long rest, you remain semi-conscious and aware of your surroundings.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Humanoid

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (about 5–7 feet tall).

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Born in Filth
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against disease and poison, and you have resistance to poison damage.

entries.name: Infected Cunning
entries: You have proficiency in the Medicine or Survival skill (your choice).

entries.name: Plague Bearer
entries: As an action, exhale a 15-foot cone of pestilent miasma. Each creature in the area must succeed on a Constitution save (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier) or take poison damage equal to your proficiency bonus and be poisoned until the end of its next turn.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus (long rest).

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Humanoid

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (about 5–7 feet tall).

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Dance of Death
entries: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with a special flourish. One creature of your choice within 5 feet must succeed on a Wisdom save (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier) or be frightened of you until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Eternal Party
entries: You have proficiency in the Performance skill. When you succeed on a Charisma (Performance) check made to entertain a crowd for at least 10 minutes, you gain Inspiration.

entries.name: Moment of Remembrance
entries: As an action, gain advantage on one ability check or saving throw of your choice that you make before the end of your next turn.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus (long rest).

entries.name: Soul of Revelry
entries: When you finish a long rest, gain temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier until you finish your next long rest.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Monstrosity

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (about 5–7 feet tall).

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet, and you have a climb speed equal to your walking speed.

entries.name: Bejeweled Carapace
entries: While you aren’t wearing armor, your base AC equals 13 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

entries.name: Silken Legacy
entries: You know the {@spell mending} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you always have {@spell spider climb} prepared; starting at 5th level, you always have {@spell web} prepared. You can cast each of these spells once without a spell slot (regained on a long rest) or using spell slots. Your spellcasting ability is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (choose when you select this species).

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries: You can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings while leaving your hands free.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Construct

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (about 5–7 feet tall).

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Argent Gleam
entries: As a bonus action, cause your silver veins to glow for 1 minute, shedding bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for 10 feet. While it shines, you have advantage on saving throws against being blinded or charmed.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus (long rest).

entries.name: Path’s Grace
entries: As an action, touch a willing creature; its speed increases by 10 feet and it ignores difficult terrain until the end of its next turn.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus (long rest).

entries.name: Silver Bulwark
entries: You have resistance to radiant damage.

entries.name: Watchful Senses
entries: You have darkvision (60 ft.) and proficiency in the Perception skill.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Construct

entries.name: Size
entries: Small (about 2–4 feet tall) or Medium (about 4–7 feet tall), chosen when you select this species.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Ball-Jointed
entries: You have advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws to resist being grappled, restrained, or knocked prone. You can move through a hostile creature’s space as narrow as 1 foot wide as if it were difficult terrain.

entries.name: Innocent Mind
entries: You have resistance to psychic damage.

entries.name: Sewn Nature
entries: You don’t require air, food, or drink.

entries.name: Soothing Heart
entries: You know the {@spell guidance} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you always have {@spell sanctuary} prepared; starting at 5th level, you always have {@spell calm emotions} prepared. You can cast each spell once without a spell slot (regained on a long rest) or using spell slots. When cast via this trait, {@spell calm emotions} can target creatures of any type. Your spellcasting ability is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (choose when you select this species).

entries.name: You've Got a Friend
entries: When a creature you can see within 30 feet that you consider a friend or ally takes damage from a creature, you can use your reaction to move up to your speed toward that creature (no opportunity attacks). If you end this movement within 5 feet of it, you can make one unarmed strike as part of the same reaction.
Uses equal to your proficiency bonus (long rest).
